content: next 3 sts making a loop every time yarn over and draw through all 4 loops finish with single_crochet that you have no hole in between repeat to = work directions in brackets the number of complete five tips times specified this means that when it is written remember to stuff before closing the star if you like for example single_crochet in first 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st you can use scrap yarn from same color embellish repeat twice this means you have to repeat with beans sewed with transparent yarn instructions in brackets twice in total bklp back loop enjoy ☺ ftlp front loop round s =round s **copyright notice** all patterns are the result of rw s = row s hard work done with all my heart and they are under st s = stitch es copyright if you do crafts i m sure you will respect my magic_ring = magic_ring work all patterns are intended for personal use only other uses are strictly prohibited notes work in continuous rnds do not join or turn my copyright terms unless otherwise instructed use a stitch marker or - you are not allowed to sell copy modify translate in colored yarn between the last st of one round and first st any language any part or the whole tutorial and/or of next round flip the end of the yarn to the front on selling it or claim it as yours the same for all the one round then to the back of next round continue for pictures each round leave yarn tail for sewing pieces together at -on the contrary you can sell the finished products the end before sewing all pieces of doll on body i unless they are from copyrighted characters created suggest you to pin all part together to be sure they are thorough the pattern provided that you made it by in correct position to end amigurumi dolls in the handmade give me credits please add a link to one of correct way i warmly suggest you to visit the very nice my shops tutorial on planetjune www planetjune com at https //www etsy com/it/shop/cinciut www planetjune com/finish http //www ravelry com/designers/sabrina-boscolo http //www craftsy com/user/1268290/pattern-store body 1 and you don t produce large numbers of finished with 2mm hook and red yarn start a magic_ring with 5 products single_crochet - any items for sale must state in the item description round 1 2 single_crochet in each st 10 sts that they are based on my pattern by cinciut and round 2 single_crochet in first st 2 single_crochet in next st repeat 5 times 15 with a link to one of my shops sts https //www etsy com/it/shop/cinciut round 3 single_crochet in first 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat 5 times http //www ravelry com/designers/sabrina-boscolo 20 sts http //www craftsy com/user/1268290/pattern-store round 4 single_crochet in first 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat 5 times -
